overview: Manny Pacquiao vs. Juan Manuel MÃ¡rquez IV was held on December 8, 2012, at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas, Nevada, billed unofficially as deciding the WBO 'Champion of the Decade' belt. Pacquiao was knocked out with one second left in the sixth round by a right to the jaw, sending him toppling face-first into the canvas.
title: Pacquiao vs. Marquez IV
